EmailTemplate.name: Negotiation Initiated
EmailTemplate.subject: Proposed award for {!ChangeRequest__c.ProgramName__c} requires response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User, This email is to notify you that an award proposal for {!ChangeRequest__c.ProgramName__c} for {!ChangeRequest__c.ExternalOrganization__c} has been initiated. To review and respond, please follow the link below.
Click here
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
